summary: A Weapon Made from Ice Wraith Material
descriptionHtml:
[center]The Magic Ice Dagger
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/H5r2tutl.jpg[/IMG]
Weapon in Scabbard
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YwUmh10l.jpg[/IMG]
Weapon outside
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3x0q8eFl.jpg[/IMG]
In the Game
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jofNrIJl.jpg?1[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OdWlMDAl.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/557WGrKl.jpg[/IMG]

Please Also Watch the Video in the Video Section and Endorse and Rate the Autor of the Video for making this excellent Videos for Skyrim Mod Reviews.

[youtube]K0G1C7g63eE[/youtube]

[youtube]ODomwxriGtU[/youtube]

I really like those Areas in Skyrim where is a lot of ICE. I like the Beauty of the Ice Rocks and Ice Water. I also like the Ice Magic and all Ice Effects. So I have decided to make myself a Weapon that has an Ice look and matches into the the Icy World of Skyrim. If you also like Ice Magic and Ice than I\'d like to Share this Mod with you.
This Mod will bring you a Special Ice Dagger made from some Ice Wraith Material especially for the Ice Mage. It comes in two different Versions. 

1st = Normal Version no enchanting (Base Damage 20/ Critical Damage 15)

and 

2nd = Enchanted version (Base Damage 30/ Critical Damage 20 ) 

Both Versions can be crafted at any Forge if you bring the right Materials and all Races and Gender can use this Mod !

Both Versions can also be Tempered to improve the Weapon more. Also more Enchantments are possible or you can add your Own Enchantments to Both Versions.


This Weapon was completely made from Scratch with all its Textures and Meshes. 

All Textures have a Resolution of 2048x2048 HD 2K

I hope you Enjoy it.

Also take a look at the Screenshots and feel free to Upload your Images !



Please Endorse this Mod if like it !


Credits to Nexus and Bethesda !

Enjoy !

[line]
